listing_by_number.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (var i in doc.numbers) emit(doc.numbers[i], null); }

listing_by_pattern.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (var i in doc.patterns) emit(doc.patterns[i], null); }

msisdn.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted || (doc.flow.module != 'user' && doc.flow.module != 'device') ) return; for (var i in doc.numbers) if(doc.numbers[i].charAt(0) == '+')  emit([doc.flow.module, doc.flow.data.id, doc.numbers[i]  ], {'msisdn' : doc.numbers[i]}); }
